results.name: Period 3: repeat [0, 2, 1].
comment: Previous name was: Jacobsthal selector sequence.
The Jacobsthal sequence A001045 can be defined by A001045(n) = Sum_{k=0..floor(n,3)} C(n, a(n-1)+3*k).
The floor of the area under the polygon connecting the lattice points: (n, a(n)) from 0..n is A001477(n), the nonnegative integers. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 16 2014
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = 2 * A001045(L(n/3)), where L(j/p) is the Legendre symbol of j and p.
a(n) = (-n) mod 3; also a(n) = 3*ceiling(n/3)-n. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, May 29 2007
program: (MAGMA) [-n mod 3 : n in [0..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 16 2014
